dataset.title: Bearded seal (Erignathus barbatus) location data from a satellite telemetry tag (ptt id 38553) deployed in the Arctic Ocean, Beaufort Sea, Bering Sea, and the Chukchi Sea from 2011-06-18 to 2012-03-14, deployment id 52d85570a86a2315ac16876f

address.deliveryPoint: U.S. Integrated Ocean Observing System Program

metadataProvider.organizationName: US Integrated Ocean Observing System Office

abstract.para: Wildlife Computers SPLASH10 tag (ptt id 38553) deployed on a bearded seal (Erignathus barbatus) by Peter Boveng in the Arctic Ocean, Beaufort Sea, Bering Sea, and the Chukchi Sea from 2011-06-18 to 2012-03-14
Abstract:A Dataset from Bio-loggers Deployed on Adult Bearded Seals (Erignathus barbatus) in Kotzebue Sound, Alaska, USA, 2009-2012

additionalInfo.para:
Access Constraints: none Use Constraints: Acknowledge the use of specific records from contributing databases in the form appearing in the 'Citation' field thereof (if any); and acknowledge the use of the OBIS facility.
For information purposes, email to info@obis.org the full citation of any publication made (printed or electronic) that cites OBIS or any constituent part.

intellectualRights.para: This work is licensed under a Public Domain (CC0 1.0).

taxonomicCoverage.generalTaxonomicCoverage: Species included below are tagged by this project and have left any embargo. Other individuals or species may later be appended to this dataset.

purpose.para: These data are for display on the OBIS portal and associated mapping programs and for download to personal computers for ad-hoc end-user analysis.

description.para: This resource was created by the Animal Telemetry Network as a summarized representation of animal presence determined by electronic tagging efforts. Darwin Core (DwC) records were extracted from the OTN database and filtered and summarized according to international agreed-upon standards.
A Dataset from Bio-loggers Deployed on Adult Bearded Seals (Erignathus barbatus) in Kotzebue Sound, Alaska, USA, 2009-2012

samplingDescription.para: Wildlife Computers SPLASH10 tag (ptt id 38553) deployed on a bearded seal (Erignathus barbatus) by Peter Boveng in the Arctic Ocean, Beaufort Sea, Bering Sea, and the Chukchi Sea from 2011-06-18 to 2012-03-14

description.para: NetCDF file created from position data obtained from Wildlife Computers API.
